articles.author: Lauren Sarner
articles.title: Even Will Ferrell's Ron Burgundy roasted Tom Brady at Netflix special: 'I never liked you' - New York Post
articles.description: “My name is Ron Burgundy. I am a very big deal but tonight is not about me. We are here to honor a champion of the gridiron, a great American, a father and a sexy man, a true patriot.”
articles.content:
Hes kind of a big deal, and his apartment smells of rich mahogany. 
Will Ferrell, 56, made a surprise appearance at Netflixs live Tom Brady roast on Sunday. 
As A-listers and comedians gathered in … [+2977 chars]
